Monday Deadline Approaching

08 Jul 2011

Last week I wrote about the “Downstream Downtown” event that we attended to learn more about the Mega Quarry slated for Melancthon, Ontario.

Yesterday, our friends at Good Food Revolution posted a video highlighting many of the people who also attended the event speaking about why the proposed Mega Quarry, just 1.5 hours outside of Toronto, is an issue we *all *need to be concerned about.

Today, I’m letting you that we’re deeply committed to this issue and we’ll continue lending our support in any way we can.

But Monday is the most important day of all.

You have until Monday to voice your opposition to the Mega Quarry. Please take a moment to watch the video below. Then register your belief that there needs to be a thorough  environmental assessment to measure the potential impact of this monster undertaking.

If you’re looking for the issues to highlight in your note, please refer here for some helpful talking points.

Stop The Mega-Quarry Chefs Speak Out from GoodFoodRevolution on Vimeo.

Video Credit: Jo Dickins

About us

Hypenotic is a marketing strategy, design & development firm that chooses to use its powers for good. We’re a certified founding member of B Corp in Canada, and if you don’t know what that is, it’s time you do. Since ’98, we’ve helped a lot of interesting people do important things. We create relevant communications and useful experiences. Find out more.
